channel.title: [Class Suggestion] The Leper
channel.description:
So, we've been without a Neutral Offensive class for, forever now.
I have a proposal, which is somewhat of a merge of Pestilence and Arsonist in ToS, but has different abilities, different playstyles, and a different win effect.
So here is the outcast peasant, the Leper! He has leprosy.
[quote]
**The Leper**
Neutral Offensive
Goal: Survive to infect all players.
**_Passives_**
**Diseased:** Anyone you visit will become infected. Anyone who visits an infected player becomes infected. Anyone who visits you will become infected.
**Epidemic:** When everyone is infected, the next day nobody may talk, vote, or use abilities.
**_Abilities_**
**Infect:** (N) (oo) Visit someone and infect them.
**Plague House:** (N) (3) Prevent all visits to you tonight. If you are bleeding or poisoned, cure yourself.
[/quote]
Please leave your feedback, I would really like to see an interesting Neutral Offensive join the game.

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Leper
item.dc:creator: Solic
item.description:
Add something that he can see who is currently infected? If that is too strong, make it a day ability possibly? At the moment he has nothing that helps his fakeclaiming and he obviously assists scum. I’d prefer an incarnation where Diseased and Infect change to this:

Diseased:
Anyone who visits you will become infected. (The first part of the original passive is also redundant)

Infect:
Occupy target player and infect target player and all players that visit target player this night.

Basically lower the infection spread, but give him more room to fake-claim.

Epidemic should also specify all players alive.
